title: Episode 49: Seeing Double
itunes:title: Episode 49: Seeing Double
description:
It’s often said that our real identity is the person we are in private, away from the public eye. Over two centuries ago, however, one person gave life to that idea, and in the process, gave birth to an entirely new thing to fear.

* * *

This episode of Lore was sponsored by:

Stamps.com: Print your own postage and shipping labels from your home or office. Start your 4-week trial today, and claim your $110 bonus offer, which includes postage and a digital scale. Just visit Stamps.com, click on the microphone in the top-right of the homepage, and type LORE.

The Great Courses Plus: Hundreds of topics taught by professors and experts, all in one enormous video library. Visit TheGreatCoursesPlus.com/lore to start your free one-month trial membership — and gain unlimited access to their entire lecture library, including my favorite, The Black Death: The World’s Most Devastating Plague.

Harry’s: Harry’s offers some amazing shaving starter sets, priced $15 and up, that make great holiday gift ideas. Each set includes a shave handle, replacement blades, a travel cover, and your choice of shave cream or gel. And with the offer code LORE, you can save an additional $5. Visit Harrys.com/lore to grab yours today before ground shipping ends on December 16th.

* * *

Official Lore Merchandise: www.lorepodcast.com/shop

Member-only Episodes: www.patreon.com/lorepodcast

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Access premium content!: https://www.patreon.com/lorepodcast
